name: Mastering Auto Layout | Part 1 | FoF New Delhi
description:
Hey Everyone,


This is the deck I shared while conducting the part 1 of mastering auto layout session. I've gone through the basics and terminologies of how it can be used.


Also, I've demonstrated interactive components as an animated background here. Make sure you check the components page for that.


Plus the link to sign up for the second part is here. Go ahead and register to join me in the next session as well.
